attributes.action: Demand that the government stops taking advantage and abusing Carers of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long this government has taken advantage of the fact that carers love the people that they care for, carers cannot strike, carers cannot stop caring for their loved ones because it would be their loved ones that suffer, the government must stop the cynical and heartless way it deals with carers of this country, our work saves this country billions, we desearve to be treated with respect, dignity, and without our government abusing our good nature and loyalty to our loved ones.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
